title: LF duo ranked or ranked team! Currently Silver 1!
body:
Hi guys,

I have just been placed into Silver 1 and was looking for person or a team that would like to climb the ladder with me!

My better positions are ADC, SUPP, and MID. However I can do top and JG just fine :)

Just send a message or add me in game!

replies.body:
I'll duo with you!

I was silver 5 last season but placements arent going too well so I thought I would look for someone on here .

I main the same as you
